title: From commit to delivery in less than 4 hours
text: A presentation about fast and reliable software development by Gabor Szabo.
In reality our goal is to be able to get from a commit to a deployed software withing minutes, but I could not resist the pun for this 4-hours long session.
In this 4-hours long session we are going to cover the current best practices of continuous integration and continuous deployment.
language: The course can be given either in English or in Hebrew with slides being in English.
